titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the phasein of the $1,000,000 exclusion from the estate and gift taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to accelerate the phase in of the $1 million exclusion from the estate and gift taxes.
